title: "Trinity Force combine cost: 200g -> 333g"
body:
Illuminati confirmed.


P.S. for people who say this shouldn't be in Memes & Games: It was deleted from Gameplay. >:(

replies.body: Remember how like like 5 or 6 patches ago they went through and changes item combine costs cuz they wanted "cleaner numbers" then they go to this..
I wanna upvote but 3 is just enough in this case

But 4 is always the best number 
http://media.tumblr.com/87231069f868a1ff7f925852cb02fcc9/tumblr_inline_n8lwffoYLv1sci4gc.jpg
http://m.imgur.com/gallery/xrn5mPj
i couldn't help but ruin everything.

Well nice try, but I can downvote all of us
http://a.fod4.com/images/GifGuide/DealWithIt/obamadealwithit_gif.gif

and i can upvote all of you 

https://media2.giphy.com/media/5RzIoaclRW2JO/200.gif

I'm so glad they changed it back. The original cost of Trinity Force was 3703 so that the combine cost was exactly 3.

For the longest time, a change in the component costs made the combine cost 78 and it bothered me so much.

I remember when the combine cost used to be 3g; I would always buy the last component and forget to just wait for the 3 gold and would run back to lane with phage+sheen+zeal. lol i'm good at this game.

First thing I thought when they changed the price to 3733 (333) was "OMG, why even bother with the price drop! All this is going to do is make people with OCD go nuts!". Then I thought about if for a minute and saw what they did there :p

http://www.theouthousers.com/forum/images/memegallery/albums/Well%20Played.gif
